entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add HTTP3 tests for Android platform handler #64410
  • Document when each of the vectorization approaches should be used #64409
    7.0.0
  • Mono debugger crashes attempting to breakpoint in a DIM in a generic interface #64408
  • Closing the AsyncWaitHandle from the result of socket.BeginConnect crashes the application in .NET 6.0 #64400
  • Remove `Verify` macros in `importer.cpp` #64399
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: inconsistent case on GC environment variable names #64393
  • JIT rolling build can build and upload non-JIT changes #64392
    7.0.0
  • GCGenerationRange events missing from Generation Aware Analysis on Linux #64390
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests timing out in the CI #64389
  • ArrayList.ToArray(type) throws exception for enum type in Blazor WebAssembly #64387
    6.0.x
  • Mono incorrectly handles conversion of negative doubles to nint #64386
  • SupportedOSPlatform/UnsupportedOSPlatform do not support delegate types #64384
  • Vector3.Cross calculates wrong value #64375
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions. #64381
    7.0.0
  • Review documentation and test coverage for multimodule assemblies #64367
  • Test failure CancelKeyPressTests.ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler #64364
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.parseTest.RunParseToStringTests #64363
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\MDArray\\GaussJordan\\plainarr_cs_d\\plainarr_cs_d.cmd #64362
  • UseNativeHttpHandler=true is not trimming correctly on mobile apps #64361
    6.0.MAUI

Closed

  • Reflection.Emit does not reliably allow use of CreateSpan<T> with non 8 byte aligned data #62314
    7.0.0
  • TryGetNameInfo_LocalHost tests failing with HostNotFound #55576
    7.0.0
  • System.RuntimeType.MakeGenericType throws NotImplementedException #32743
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support streaming deserialization of JSON objects #64182
  • [API Proposal]: RequiredMemberAttribute and NoRequiredMembersAttribute #64248
    7.0.0
  • Add Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core support to Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility for .NET Standard #64334
  • [API Proposal]: Add X509SubjectAlternativeNameExtension #64388
  • [API Proposal]: RemoteCertificateValidationCallback cannot detect future certificates #63830
    7.0.0
  • Ssl3 tests failing on Windows 11 #64372
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Serializer Behavior Changes Depending on Object Interfaces #64302
  • Mono calli does not setup LMF #64073
    7.0.0
  • ArrayPool<T>.Return should clear specified number of elements in array #64382
  • Support IsSpecified properties like Json.Net to handle JSON Merge Patch #64380
  • Double.ToString(format) not throwing FormatException #64295
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS #51371
    7.0.0
  • Update when Vector256<T>.IsHardwareAccelerated returns true #64309
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add (e.g.) `out bool created` to MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen() #60664
  • `NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged` event leaks threads on Linux #63788
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] BrowserHttpHandler to support large/streaming requests via ReadableStream #64333
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] the value "$(JsonToItemsTaskFactoryTasksAssemblyPath)" of the "AssemblyFile" attribute in element is not valid #63994

PullRequests

Created

  • [ILVerify] Recognize type equivalence of two types with `System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeIdentifierAttribute` #64413
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Change condition on RegexReductionTests to be explicit about trimming #64411
  • Fix ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler test #64407
    area-System.Console
  • Remove pinning from StringBuilder #64405
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix some nullability warnings in NativeAOT CoreLib #64404
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-vs4mac' #64403
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix BigInteger outerloop test failure #64402
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix DateOnly and TimeOnly Formatting using interpolated strings #64398
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Add incremental build instructions when ... #64396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Xamarin assembly names in HttpClientHandler #64391
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.3
  • Copy propagation tweaking #64378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    community-contribution
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Add support for byref fields in NativeAOT/crossgen2 #64366
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Metrics UpDownCounter #64365
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Align rva fields in reflection emit #63430
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated to return true only on AVX2 #64345
  • Fix Xamarin assembly names in HttpClientHandler #64385
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Temporarily disable EC file import tests #64397
    area-System.Security
  • Disable ipv6 lookup tests when needed #64313
    area-System.Net
  • Remove workarounds for RemoteExecutor (dotnet/arcade#5865) #64360
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Re-enable tests that call MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType arguments #64344
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Build ILCompiler NuGet packages #63212
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • 2 fixes related to commit/decommit #64316
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix arm64 genInstrWithConstant #64368
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add attributes for required members #64287
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • ARM64: Avoid LEA for volatile IND #64354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [docs] Collecting stack traces with native symbols on WebAssembly #64383
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix minor things in comments to DllImportGenerator #64088
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Remove some of the unused resource strings #64379
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Always store to allocas in OP_LLVM_OUTARG_VT #64303
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Clone ADDR(LCL) for DUP #64171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid inlining the wrappers used by CALLI. #64290
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Override all `Read` methods in `NullTextReader` and `NullStreamReader` #64301
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Run Pi tests on a different queue, which runs ARM32 tests #64353
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean up RegexCode opcodes and debug-only tracing #64346
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Reverse `ASG(CLS_VAR, ...)` #63957
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Simplify the creation of diagnostics using DiagnosticId #64250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Codespaces] Make it possible to run wasm samples in the browser #64277
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes a few issues for dprintf on OSX #64076
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over minimal code from Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Removing `tiVerificationNeeded` in the JIT #64356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64352
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 6.0.3
  • gcc compilations for ARM64 can not initialize extern "C" variables. #64239
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • enable osr stress tests for libraries and add fixes #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Cancel pending ReadableStream on Dispose or cancelationToken #64285
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix Issue #21678: Add Path.Exists -- to replace inefficient FileExists || DirectoryExists #64347
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add/use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #64357
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add xarch `andn` #64350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Set wasm debugger log level at execution time. #64339
    area-Debugger-mono
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] Use byteCount when deciding what instruction sequence to use in genCodeForCpBlkUnroll #64315
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.15 #64304
    area-Meta, 6.0.3
  • [wasm][debugger] Move the breakpoint line after applying changes #64359
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64234
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • FileSystem.Unix: CopyFile: use copy_file_range on Linux. #64264
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName #64062
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fold inbox crypto into one assembly #64307
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wip] Run tests on newer Android #64341
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Check for CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID not CXX #64226
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • ARM64: Avoid jump stubs where possible #64148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ran great, then after relaunch of Rider, "Unable to resolve ..." #1833

Closed

  • I am trying to compile a .net core app, seeing linking errors.. #1634
  • [Native AOT]: how to make ILC not to append these libs #1832

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • feature request: "dotnet format" mode that only formats code #23641
  • dotnet tools do not support differing entitlements than the dotnet muxer on Mac #23640
  • PackageValidation is causing unnecessary project evaluations which noticeably slows down a project's build #23630
  • `ApplicationManifest` is not respected when building for Windows on Linux #23627

Closed

  • reenable tests blocked by the install script bug #23531
    6.0.3xx
  • With .NET 7, unable to repair deleted files after executing "dotnet workload repair" #23503

PullRequests

Created

  • Include fsharp core #23629
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Prevent errors when building a 5.0 app with .cshtml.css files #23636
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow pdb deltas to be applied to Blazor WASM app #23581
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Backport System.CommandLine updates to 6.0.3xx #23345
    Area-CLI, 6.0.3xx

Updated

  • GenerateRuntimeConfig now uses stream serialization instead of loading file in memory #22576
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23604
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Need an option to make use of constructor features within in another method that will be invoked only from the constructor. More in the description. #5694

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Checked Operators #4665
    Working Set
  • Proposal: User-defined positional patterns #4131
  • String-based enums #2849
  • Champion "utf8 string literals" #184
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add checked-user-defined-operators.md proposal #5699
  • Update required members spec #5688
  • Support for ref struct as generic arguments #5689

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Hot Reload concept of Reloadable Types needs to be added to capabilities check #59118
  • Error 0x80041FEB or text mode when auto-opening editorconfig created with Add > New EditorConfig #59114
  • Unable to open .editorconfig files #59113
  • VsCrash when trying to create . EditorConfig #59112
  • Ensure AbstractFlowPass<,> is always constructed with a non-null CSharpCompilation instance #59111
  • 'Simplify new expression (IDE0090)' should arguably _not_ be encouraged #59119
  • /errorlog should handle valid directory/file names #59110
  • Match Folder and Namespace is not documented. #59103
  • RE0001 should be moved to Analyzers layer #59101
  • EditorConfig UI: Location column doesn't refresh #59099
  • "Operator placement when wrapping" should belong to code-style tab #59098
  • C# style analyzer: invoke statics from the type on which they're declared #59094
  • NullReferenceException in AbstractFlowPass evaluating local function with switch statement in EE #59093

Closed

  • Add analyzer/code fix for target-typed new expressions #46700
    Backlog
  • Typing `///` in top-level statements inserts a documentation comment template #59081
  • Creating a new C# class from item template is missing a space between the access modifier and 'class' keyword #58974
    17.2.P1
  • InvalidCastException from DefiniteAssignmentPass during extract method analysis #57428
    17.1
  • Code cleanup supports editorconfig #58087
    Backlog
  • Fix parameter doc completion on primary constructors #59095

PullRequests

Created

  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge the interpolated end tokens into a single token #59122
    Area-Compilers
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • Fix 'hasStaticConstructor' check in MethodCompiler #59116
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Adjust reflection based code in VisualStudioDiagnosticAnalyzerProvide…" #59115
    Area-Analyzers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Minor refactoring #59109
    Area-Compilers
  • Update paths in `.vscode/launch.json` due to TFM changes #59108
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Add note about redirection for documenting IDExxxx #59107
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor IDE0003 (Qualify 'this'/'Me') #59102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on options from IDiagnosticService #59096
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Format document after each provider #59091
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid assuming containing assembly is from source in DefiniteAssignment #59069
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project #59059
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Insert documentation comments only on supported declarations #59084
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59092
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Json parsing #42864
    Area-IDE, Need Design Review
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59124
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [Draft] Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Update StreamJsonRpc #59073
    Area-Infrastructure
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Switch liveshare to use LSP pull diagnostics and cleanup server name usages #57596
    Area-IDE, LSP, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix Roslyn Diagnostic Window and add Workspace panel #59035
    Area-IDE
  • Integration test options #58744
    Area-IDE
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • List patterns: Recreate the decision dag for lowering #59019
    Area-Compilers
  • EditorConfig UI help link #54623
    Area-IDE
  • Remove extra logic to see if users are squatting on keywords #59086
    Area-IDE
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers
  • AddImportPlacementOptions #59028
    Area-IDE
  • Move global options to EditorFeature layer #59071
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net Blazor markup "if" code compiles and executes dispite being bad written #39824
  • Window Authentication in Linux .net core #39816
  • Design proposal: Multiple same-named event handlers #39815
    7.0-preview2
  • Blazor doesn't render ErrorBoundary's ErrorContent when there are two different exceptions inside it's ChildContent #39814
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Error "Server timeout elapsed without receiving a message" while calling the invoke method of signalr hubconnection #39811
  • Error unprotecting the session cookie #39807
  • Blazor and WebComponents #39806
  • Media type application/problem+json still lost in combination with ProducesAttribute #39802

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 6.0.1 Update not working #39531
    6.0.x
  • Update our processes to reserve time as part of milestone for better validation #38535
    7.0-preview2
  • Razor Pages - ModelBinder Improperly Fills Dictionary with Form Values #39767
  • SignalR : Want to send signal to client when it reconnects to server #39770
  • Better documentations about blazor dom events #39645
  • Can't inject service in ValidationAttribute #39382
    7.0-preview1
  • BlazorWebAssemblyLazyLoad By Dependency Injection #39774
  • JS Isolation not working on .net 5 blazor server app / 404 #39799
  • [Blazor] Allow only specific Components as Children #39808
  • How to detect the current application is web assembly or server application in source. #39805
  • Perf improvement: https #39788
  • Host a Blazor WASM component in an Angular app? #39800
  • Information in the JwtBearer comments is not up-to-date #39725
  • reference a sourcegenerator and use razor pages in same project ... Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp version error #39297
  • Dotnet 6 ommits If-None-Match Request header making ETag usage impossible #39516
  • Inconsistent return from API while using IISExpress in Visual Studio 2022 #39524
  • Blazor component errors are not informative #39580

PullRequests

Created

  • Try tests on arm64 queue #39821
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Added support for arrays of types with TryParse #39809
    area-web-frameworks
  • Inferring FromServices optionality #39804
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update Blazor survey links for .NET 7.0 #39823
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Bug Report Duplicate Issue Search Link #39789
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update code docs for DynamicRouteValueTransformer #36653
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Fixup build warning #39817
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable IDE2000 #39803
    7.0-preview1
  • Update JwtBearerOptions and OpenIdConnectOptions #39782
    area-security, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add readonly to record struct #39755
    area-runtime
  • Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #39685
    area-security
  • Fork component analyzers #39796
    area-blazor
  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove Interop build step #39553
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc
  • Jmprieur/fix web api templates #36130
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-templates, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the generated DML for Array contents. #2832
    bug, auto-merge, .NET 7.0
  • Adding Commandline args to dotnet-tool ps #2831

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Having issue with svg files #4361
  • API Docs - reconcile code comment docs with existing forms docs #4359
    .NET 7
  • App crashes in Release configuration #4358
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [Inconsistency] Blazor Android Webview link with `_blank` target opens in current webview instead of new window #4357
  • Calling ClearValue if a color is null on WinUI is incorrect behavior #4356
  • Validate and review the changes required for the iOS NFloat #4353
  • X509Certificate Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform #4352
  • OnIdiom markup extension gets the Windows form factor wrong #4351
  • OnPlatform markup extension defines properties for platforms no longer supported #4350
  • Clean removal of previous versions of MAUI when a new one is installed #4344
  • XamlG Errors need to be surfaced more clearly #4343
  • Splash Screen does not resize(Scaling Issue) #4341
  • Appicon cannot be changed #4340

Closed

  • VS17.1Prv1: Maui default solution loads of errors #3421
  • [WinUI] Convert TabbedRenderer to an implementation of IViewHandler #3955
  • Clean up the namespaces #3101
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Spec] Rebuild TabbedPage On WinUI against NavigationView instead of Pivot #2796
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • XPlat Page Lifecycle #1721
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • iOS App Crashes if Hyperlink is Clicked in MAUI Blazor Project - NullReferenceException #3474
  • Service is not registered for AuthenticationStateProvider in AddBlazorWebView - WPF BlazorWebView #3580
  • [Bug] Code only throws exception inside Http DelegatingHandler in .NET MAUI Blazor #1690
  • Accessing Local Storage inside `DelegatingHandler` in Blazor Server and .NET MAUI Blazor #2547

PullRequests

Created

  • WinUI TabbedPage Tests/Cleanup/BarBackground #4360
  • [android] update built-in AOT profile #4355
  • Adding API diffs to the build #4354
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • [iOS] Add pending events in EntryHandler #4347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Add pending Picker events and notify items collection changes #4346
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • GraphicsView Touches - Alternate API #4342

Merged

  • [Android] Changes to reduce unnecessary layout requests #4229
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, partner
  • Support opening a new window in iOS Blazor WebView #4268
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS, Android, Windows] Implement Border properties in ImageButton #3641
    area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimize hangs and stops responding. #27301
  • First migration rollback does not delete the __EFMigrationsHistory table #27300
  • How to correctly configure a composite primary key with HasDefault() for Sqlite? #27299
  • After migrating 2.2.6 to 6.0.0 EF Core Migrations Snapshot problems #27298
  • Unnecessary join when GroupBy and Select #27297
  • Allow to customize an alias in model binding #27296
  • Support for EF Core 3.1 on .NET Framework #27294

Closed

  • `scaffold --data-annotations` no longer emits [Required] attributes. This causes issues running `ef dbcontext script` as required columns are emitted as NULLable #27270
  • Cannot use table 'AspNetRoles' for entity type 'AspNetRole' since it is being used for entity type 'IdentityRole' and potentially other entity types, but there is no linking relationship. #27251
  • Scaffolding tool is generating invalid C# code when generating many-to-many relationships #27295

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27072 - Suboptimal SQL generation for query with optional navigation, its collection navigation and lateral join #27302

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Convert single result subquery comparison to null to Any operation #27284
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Query: Match correct predicate structure to convert apply to join #27292
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • Add <inheritdoc /> in migrations #27268
  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Fix parameter type mapping for Sqlite #27291

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When installing .NET 7.0 SDK, some packages' version are 6.0 not 7.0 #13127

Closed

  • With .NET 7 SDK, the default tfm is net6.0 not net7.0 for created projects #12892
  • With .NET 7, installed workloads and packs were still listed in "C:\Program Files\dotnet" after uninstalling the SDK. #13013

PullRequests

Created

  • Update pools #13137
  • Update poolversion #13136
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13135
  • Save runtime commit to productCommit-rid.txt #13132

Merged

  • Updates to produce Microsoft.DotNet.Common.ProjectTemplates.2.1/6.0 in source-build #13122
    ask-mode
